long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension seamlessly transforms HotStreak's decimal odds into American odds. It scans the web app and instantly converts all multipliers into the American moneyline odds format (e.g. +150, -200) for a more familiar betting understanding without any manual calculation.
